column2: player|So the legend goes, about 20 years ago, an ordinary man came to this city and suddenly became a mega-playboy.
column3: player|He was rich, smart, powerful, charismatic and had just about anything a woman could possibly want.
column4: player|He had four wives and hundreds of girlfriends; the sweetheart of all women and the envy of all men.
column7: player|and some said he had moved to a man-made archipelago called Shambala in the Southern Pacific.
column8: player|After getting out of college, my friend Sao and I decided to come here to learn a bit more about this mega-playboy.
column9: player|Despite the fact that my mom kept bashing him till the day she passed away, this guy is my role model.
column10: player|According to our research he was a frequent visitor of this little mysterious shop before he left the city,
column11: player|so, we decided to follow his footsteps and come to this place...
column15: spC|Hey! Welcome to my mystic shop.
column16: spC|If you guys want to know more about the legendary mega-playboy…, I can do a tarot reading for you.
column17: spC|Your energies are special. Hmm... I have a good feeling that some great things are coming to you soon.
column19: spC|To begin with, can I know your name?
column21: spC|Ok $$$, now just use your gut feelings and pick one card out of the four, would you?
column24: spC|I can see that you will be travelling again very soon. Maybe in a couple weeks. You will travel to a very beautiful place.
column26: spL|Hey lady! This is just not gonna happen! We’d spent all our savings just to come to this place.
column27: spL|This guy won’t have the money to travel again anytime soon.
column28: spL|Unless you’re going to say he’ll win a lottery ticket next week…
column29: player|This guy is my best friend Sao. We were neighbors. We went to the same grade school and college.
column30: player|We practically grew up together. We were closer than many real siblings.
column32: spR|Shhhh… quiet! I do see that there’s big money coming to you soon.
column33: spR|Maybe you will use this money to travel. I am pretty sure.
column35: spR|How about this? You don’t need to pay me. If nothing happens in the next 30 days,
column36: spR|just consider this a free trial. If I am right, you guys know what you should do.
column37: spL|Deal! If your predictions come true, we will come back and kiss your ass.
column38: thR|I hate dealing with stupid jerks...
column39: spR|No thanks. Just spread a few good words for me on Blackspears.com will do.
column41: player|After that day, we continued our quest to find out more about Primero Lovemore,
column42: player|and just about 2 weeks later, the miracle happened.
column44: player|We won the grand prize of a soft drink company’s big giveaway campaign.
column45: player|It includes a $40,000 cash reward and two first-class flight tickets to Shambala.
column46: player|It was just fxxking unbelievable. We went back to the mystic shop to look for the tarot lady,
column47: player|but she was no longer there.
column48: player|Sao and I split the cash and we decided to visit Shambala together.

column4: spC|Yea man this is fxxking awesome. I love first class, baby!
column6: player|This is the first time we travel first class.
column7: player|15 minutes after departure, Sao is still excited. He is fooling around as usual.
column9: player|I just want to relax. I pick up a travel magazine in front of me.
column10: player|“The No.1 attraction in Shambala: Verada Beach”
column11: player|There's an article promoting a heavenly beach in Shambala.
column13: player|Suddenly there is an airplane bump and I drop the magazine.
column14: player|I am trying to reach down to the floor to pick it up,
column15: player|but an air hostess reaches it before I do.
column18: player|She returns the magazine with a smile.
column19: player|I have to say she is the prettiest air hostess I've seen so far.
column20: player|My heart stops beating for a moment and I am speechless for a couple seconds.
column21: player|She must think I am a weirdo.
column23: spC|Is there anything I can help you, sir?
column25: spL|Ma'am, can you bring me a coke?
column26: spR|Sure! I'll be right back with your coke.
column29: spL|Hey man, this chick is freakin hot! Do you think we can get her number?
column30: spL|I'll give it a shot anyway.
column33: player|When the air hostess is coming back with Sao's drink, a passenger bumps into her.
column34: player|The coke is poured all over the passenger’s pants.
column37: spL|Oh no! I am so sorry!
column38: player|The passenger is pointing at his dick and asks the air hostess to rub it for him.
column40: spR|I'll forgive you because you are kind of cute.. but you have to clean this up for me.
column43: spL|Hey take it easy dude! It is just a mistake.
column44: spR|Who the fxxk are you? It’s none of your fxxking business.
